explanation: [0-0] A cartoon brown bear stands by a wooden box door with a star pattern, its left hand resting on the box door and a blue book in its right hand. The floor under the box has a red pattern, while the wall behind the box has red and yellow stripes.

[0-2] As the brown bear waves its left hand in the air and then lowers it, a little girl wearing a purple magic dress with a yellow star pattern and a purple magic hat with a star pattern runs quickly from the right side of the screen towards the bear and closes the box door.

[0-2] As the brown bear waves its left hand in the air and then lowers it, a little girl wearing a purple magic dress with a yellow star pattern and a purple magic hat with a star pattern runs quickly from the right side of the screen towards the bear and closes the box door.

[2-7] Then the little girl pushes the box door with effort, rotating it to the left for a full circle before opening it. At this point, the bear in the box disappears from the screen. Then the scene changes to the little girl jumping in place and clapping her hands happily.
